mapper.select: SELECT c.vote_count, s.* from game_star_vote_count c, game_star_vote s where s.id = c.star_id and c.count_date = #{0} and c.is_deleted = 'n' and s.is_deleted = 'n' and c.count_type = 'day' order by c.vote_count desc limit 0,100
